name: Penguin Raceα
description:
In the north of earth Mr.Adams, penguin's teacher says "Go!!". You control a penguin and run to get flag. Everybody follows a rule and a manner, and let's enjoy!

You can play with keyboard and click.
It takes about 5-15 minutes to play this game. 
You can play in 9 language: English Korean Japanese Chinese French German Spanish Dutch Russian

This is alpha version. but  no plans of more development is decided now.
